input.sentences: i went on a road trip last week .
i stopped by a small town .
there were not many people out .
some of the houses were very big .
output.sentences: They decided to head down South for a road trip.
There were plenty of stops for snacks and gas.
They witnessed an accident along the way.
They stayed at cheap motels, for a few different nights.
The trip was worth it for the view.
